subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball (College)
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: While the postseason tournament accounts for roughly 90 percent of the N.C.A.A.’s annual revenue, it has rendered college basketball’s regular season largely irrelevant.
snippet: While the postseason tournament accounts for roughly 90 percent of the N.C.A.A.’s annual revenue, it has rendered college basketball’s regular season largely irrelevant.
